messages.message:
Hey team, just got off a use case deep-dive with ANZx and ANZ Mortgage Origination teams. They had a variety of questions + feature requests that I've taken away to find answers to. Can I get some help confirming answers to the below?
1. 'How can teams collaborate inside one project' - EPD-2808 (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2808?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiZmIwNjU4NDliNTc5NDUwZmEzNzVmOGRjZGY3YzNlY2MiLCJwIjoiaiJ9), EPD-1223 (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1223?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiNjg2OWJiYzliNDQ2NGMwNDkwNTRiMGUyYzVkNGM4MTciLCJwIjoiaiJ9)
    a. Any timelines for these @Kaustubh (KD)?
2. 'Can we do GitHub style integrations for projects'. Particularly they were interested in PRs, managing changes etc for projects. - EPD-1223 (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1223?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiNjg2OWJiYzliNDQ2NGMwNDkwNTRiMGUyYzVkNGM4MTciLCJwIjoiaiJ9)
    a. Does this need a separate? History + version management is becoming a very common request for Enterprise customers @Kaustubh (KD) 
    b. Any idea on timelines or how much prompt histories will cover?
3. 'I'd like to pull/push metrics into the Deployments dashboard, to or from other systems. Particularly I want pub, sub and scrape kind of end points' - EPD-3173 (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3174?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiYzY4NTIzMjJmMTIyNGQ0YjkwOTNmNGNlNGQ1NWY4MDEiLCJwIjoiaiJ9)
    a. @jack.robbins do we expect this anytime soon?
4. 'How can we cross-validate across documents in AI Hub without PS support?' EPD-1857 (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1857?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiZWZjMmJhZDNhNDRjNDJiYzhhMDI2YzY0Y2JlMjIxOGQiLCJwIjoiaiJ9)
    a. @Kaustubh (KD) any projected date here?
5. ~'Does the webhook activate upon a review action? E.g. I get one notification on job completion, do I get another each time a document is reviewed? Only when batch is reviewed?'~
    a. ~@Anil maybe the best person to help me here?~
6. ~'How do split-classified files appear in the API output?' @Anil~ 
    a. ~They were interested in whether outputs we linked e.g. nested results inside file name.~
    b. ~Also wanted to know if they can link back to the underlying files (I assume that has to be via their mounted S3 bucket)~

1.   We have not prioritized any collaboration related work this quarter (in favor of larger items like case management). Both these are not in scope of Q4. So unfortunately cannot provide a timeline yet.

2.   GitHub style integration can be quite involved, I think for these the earliest version of version history is https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2939 which is a stretch item for Q4.

4.   We will have cross-class validation coming with Case management. This is likely Q1 in terms of being a deliverable.

For #3 - we don't have timelines for pushing metrics to Deployments dashboard, but we could look into exposing the IB Platform APIs for Automation metrics: https://platform.instabase.com/docs/apis/v2-apis/automation-metrics/index.html

I wouldn't commit to anything there without eng. confirming this can be done safely (cc @Elan Sharony), but that's probably the fastest route to getting them the detail they may require. It would be helpful to understand specifically what they're looking for though to see if it could be built into AI Hub.
